Community Watch: Organize and lead a community watch program to encourage neighbors to monitor and report suspicious activity.
Emergency Response Plan: Develop an emergency response plan for your home and family, including evacuation routes, communication protocols, and first aid kits.
Alternative Forms of Communication: Maintain alternative forms of communication, such as a ham radio or two-way radio, to stay informed about local events and emergencies.
Personal Security App: Develop a personal security app that connects with other community members, allows for instant communication, and includes emergency response protocols.
Neighborhood Network: Build a neighborhood network of trusted individuals who can provide assistance in case of an emergency.
